mm7_adapter.description: Provides connectivity between SDP and MMSC using MM7 protocol for handling MMS messages.

requirements.REQ-MM7-1: Supports MM7 v1.1 and v1.2 protocols
requirements.REQ-MM7-2: Handles both MO (Mobile Originated) and MT (Mobile Terminated) MMS flows
requirements.REQ-MM7-3: Supports SLA enforcement for MMS message size and throughput
requirements.REQ-MM7-4: Handles MMS delivery reports and error notifications
requirements.REQ-MM7-5: Supports retry mechanism for failed MMS submissions
requirements.REQ-MM7-6: Generates CDRs for all MMS transactions
requirements.REQ-MM7-7: Supports charging types defined in Rating Module (Flat, Variable, Free)
